@mario_cro

Have you tried running the game in compatibility mode XP SP3 as I mentioned in my previous post?

That did the trick for me.

Just right click and go to properties of the .exe, and select the compatibility there...

@PuffingKush

Glad you can play.
Currently the PC version still has plenty of bugs, so you wont have the same experience as the xbox version for a while.

As for your computer.SP3 could help with performance, but it's still recommended to get SP3 either way. And also update your .NET Framework.

i done this in "/super meat boy/" and "/super meat boy/resources/" and it fixed the problem
